definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
Nara period (710-794) in early Japanese history
the Six Dynasties period (222-589) between Han and Tang
Song of the Southern dynasties (420-479), with capital at Nanjing

sentences.english: Thee sight of these pictures made me remember my own childhood.
sentences.chinese: 看到这幅画让我想到了我的童年时代。

sentences.english: The sound of happy laughters called up memories of his childhood.
sentences.chinese: 这些欢笑声使他回忆起童年时代。

sentences.english: The Restoration is an important transformable age in the history of finance and taxation in England .
sentences.chinese: 复辟时期是英国财政与税收史上的一个重要转型时代。

sentences.english: Time Millennium Real Estate Wimberley, Texas.
sentences.chinese: 时代千年房地产威伯利得克萨斯。

sentences.english: Colors embody the vivid characteristics of the age and fashion.
sentences.chinese: 色彩是赋有鲜明的时代感和时髦性的。

sentences.english: Time Warner is parent company of AOL.
sentences.chinese: 时代华纳是美国在线的母公司。

sentences.english: During Hellenistic times, Greek women also started to artificially wave and curl their hair.
sentences.chinese: 在希腊化时代期间，希腊女人就已开始人为地卷发了。

sentences.english: Descriptions from that era describe ripe watermelons as having a yellowish interior.
sentences.chinese: 那个时代对成熟西瓜的描述是拥有淡黄色的内瓤。

sentences.english: Their friendship dates from college days.
sentences.chinese: 他们的友谊可追溯到大学时代。

sentences.english: This is the day of salvation, calling sinners to repent and believe the gospel.
sentences.chinese: 这是拯救的时代，呼召罪人悔改，相信福音。

sentences.english: That's true.And more Chinese step on the cover of "Times".
sentences.chinese: 没错，而且越来越多的中国人登上了时代周刊封面。

sentences.english: The New Age person often prefers a direct spiritual experience rather than one from organized religion.
sentences.chinese: 新时代人经常宁爱直接的灵性体验胜过有组织的宗教。

sentences.english: The Agricultural Age has brought about the agriculturization of the planet.
sentences.chinese: 农业时代为我们的世界带来了农业化。

sentences.english: Anna's constant search for new ideas and challenges keeps her ahead of her times.
sentences.chinese: 对新理念与挑战的不断追求令安娜始终走在时代前列。

sentences.english: Its age is late Early Triassic.
sentences.chinese: 其时代为早三叠世晚期。

sentences.english: Who lived in the land in the time of Moses?
sentences.chinese: 那片土地在摩西时代居住的是什么人？

definition: a decade of a century (e.g. the Sixties)/age/era/period/CL:個|个[ge4]
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
